languages.text: "Я бы лучше утопила его в канале нечистот... Но и ваш вариант сойдет, шерин. Паскудной крысе — паскудная смерть!"

traits.locale_text: "Я бы лучше утопила его в канале нечистот... Но и ваш вариант сойдет, шерин. Паскудной крысе — паскудная смерть!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "I'd rather drown him in sewage myself... But your suggestion will do, shereen. A stinking death for a stinking rat!"
languages.original_text: "Я бы лучше утопила его в канале нечистот... Но и ваш вариант сойдет, шерин. Паскудной крысе — паскудная смерть!"

traits.locale_text: "I'd rather drown him in sewage myself... But your suggestion will do, shereen. A stinking death for a stinking rat!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I'd rather drown him in sewage myself... But your suggestion will do, shereen. A stinking death for a stinking rat!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I'd rather drown him in sewage myself... But your suggestion will do, shereen. A stinking death for a stinking rat!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I'd rather drown him in sewage myself... But your suggestion will do, shereen. A stinking death for a stinking rat!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I'd rather drown him in sewage myself... But your suggestion will do, shereen. A stinking death for a stinking rat!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「むしろ俺のこの手であいつを下水に沈めてやりたいさ…だが、あんたの提案で十分だ、シャリーン。臭いネズミに相応しい臭い死だ！」
languages.original_text: "I'd rather drown him in sewage myself... But your suggestion will do, shereen. A stinking death for a stinking rat!"

traits.locale_text: 「むしろ俺のこの手であいつを下水に沈めてやりたいさ…だが、あんたの提案で十分だ、シャリーン。臭いネズミに相応しい臭い死だ！」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “我更愿意亲手把他淹死在臭水沟里……但你的建议也很不错，亲爱的。像这种臭老鼠，就适合这种臭烘烘的死法。”
languages.original_text: "I'd rather drown him in sewage myself... But your suggestion will do, shereen. A stinking death for a stinking rat!"

traits.locale_text: “我更愿意亲手把他淹死在臭水沟里……但你的建议也很不错，亲爱的。像这种臭老鼠，就适合这种臭烘烘的死法。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Antes lo ahogaría en la alcantarilla... Pero no me parece mal lo que sugiere, shereen. ¡Una muerte hedionda para una rata hedionda!».
languages.original_text: "I'd rather drown him in sewage myself... But your suggestion will do, shereen. A stinking death for a stinking rat!"

traits.locale_text: «Antes lo ahogaría en la alcantarilla... Pero no me parece mal lo que sugiere, shereen. ¡Una muerte hedionda para una rata hedionda!».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Je préférerais le noyer moi-même au milieu des ordures... Mais soit, shereen. Une mort répugnante pour un rat tout aussi répugnant ! »
languages.original_text: "I'd rather drown him in sewage myself... But your suggestion will do, shereen. A stinking death for a stinking rat!"

traits.locale_text: « Je préférerais le noyer moi-même au milieu des ordures... Mais soit, shereen. Une mort répugnante pour un rat tout aussi répugnant ! »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ich würde ihn lieber selbst im Abwasser ertränken ... Aber Euer Vorschlag reicht aus, Shereen. Ein stinkender Tod für eine stinkende Ratte!"
languages.original_text: "I'd rather drown him in sewage myself... But your suggestion will do, shereen. A stinking death for a stinking rat!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde ihn lieber selbst im Abwasser ertränken ... Aber Euer Vorschlag reicht aus, Shereen. Ein stinkender Tod für eine stinkende Ratte!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Onu lağımda kendim boğmayı yeğlerim... Ancak senin dediğin de olur şirinim. Pislik içinde gebersin pislik!"
languages.original_text: "I'd rather drown him in sewage myself... But your suggestion will do, shereen. A stinking death for a stinking rat!"

traits.locale_text: "Onu lağımda kendim boğmayı yeğlerim... Ancak senin dediğin de olur şirinim. Pislik içinde gebersin pislik!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
